website_summaries.verdict: Ladies who prefer comfortable, casual loafers will love how these shoes feel and look. Once they find a size that works, they won't mind the budget-friendly price either.
pros: Stand out for their extremely comfortable fit that is suitable for extensive walking
Have cushion-soft insoles and slip-resistant soles
cons: Threads occasionally come loose from some of the stitching

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are really nice and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I just got these shoes in and wow! I am pleasantly surprised. These shoes are really nice and comfy! I was worried they might be kinda hard or clumpy, but was I wrong! They are stretchy and hug your feet. I have big feet, so am picky about light colored shoes that draw attention to them, but these are super cute. I wear a 10 and ordered 10 1/2 and they fit great! I am ordering more colors for sure.
customer_reviews.author: KNL

customer_reviews.title: I have bought 6 pair!
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how much I love these shoes!!! I wear and 8_8.5 and I got a 9, only because I was getting insoles. I could have gone with and 8.5, but they don't have that size. I have bought 4 pairs of these shoes that is how much I love! Update! I took these to Rome, we walked all day and night. They were great! I have actually bought 6 pairs now! I did get insoles for Rome, just because of all the walking on cobblestone. I wear them here with and without the insoles. Also - great in rain! I get so many complements, LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, very comfortable and soft. Didn't expect to like them so much. I just wish there was an option where the soling was white as well, is there? Nice shoe though...update! I wore the shoe once and some of the threading has already begun to loosen, it's still a good shoe, really comfortable however I'm not sure if it'll hold up for a long time. Update 20/4/18 Shoe is still going strong despite the threading mishap. I took a lighter n burn the end so it wouldn't loosen ( it worked). Got many compliments, most ppl think they are Clark's or loafers lol
customer_reviews.author: Angelibliss

customer_reviews.title: Leather loafers
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are wonderfully comfortable! I’m a size 8 and ordered an 8. I wear these with no socks. They have plenty of room, but aren’t falling off my feet. I’m on my feet all day and have bad knees. These feel great!!! Nothing rubs my foot in any spot. The insoles have a leather feel, with foam on the underside. I don’t think the foam will last very long, but I’ll just replace the insoles at that time. Worth the money, for sure!
customer_reviews.author: KloT

customer_reviews.title: I love these flats
customer_reviews.text: I love these flats, it's amazing!! I wear a size 6.5 and bought the 7. It fits perfectly. The leather is super soft. I can live in them, I will probably buy another pair in another color. One bad thing tho, the shoe cushion does lift up cause I wear it w/o socks, but I used double sided tape and it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are super comfortable and pretty
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super comfortable and pretty. I really like them may order more in other colors. The color is very pretty. They are slightly small but not uncomfortably so.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weirdly loose
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 6.5-7 and bought a size 7, and the length of the shoe was just about spot on, but the upper was way too big making the shoes look weirdly loose or baggy on my feet. They wouldn’t stay on while walking either since the sides of the shoe were so out of proportion that they barely touched my feet. Maybe they would fit if you had really wide feet? Also the soles of the shoe are not attached to the shoe. Seems like if they had fit they would have been pretty comfortable, which is why they get a few stars. Unfortunately they don’t so I’m returning them.
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: Love this. I will be purchasing more
customer_reviews.text: Oh My ShoE!!! Love this. I will be purchasing more. A little snug when I first put on, but as I wore throughout the first day, the leather loosened up and my feet felt fabulous. Everyone needs a pair. I really love the silver.
customer_reviews.author: Donna A.

customer_reviews.title: Becomes bulky af
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box was perfect. However, after the first wear of about 6 hours and they stretch out to another size. Unfortunately, I felt like I had duck feet on my feet during the second time I wore them. The color is lovely but I only got to wear them twice. The stretch out is in the strangest areas. I have narrow feet, so the stretch out isn't from the fit. I was really looking forward to purchasing several pairs after I first put them on but now think it was a waiste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Hagan

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: They're comfortable enough, not something I would call the least bit dressy but for around the house, a trip to the market, casual wear, they work just fine. Since I wear a size 8, that is what I ordered but either they run a bit large or they stretch. Not sure which happened but I would consider going down a size if I order again. They are good looking and are not showing signs of wear, so I may consider another pair in another color. The blue/navy is a true color. Yes, I would recommend them without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: amazing shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: I read all of the reviews and was still skeptical. I ordered 3 pair anyway. I am in no way disappointed with them!! They are so comfortable!! I am going on a cruise to Alaska and I wanted a shoe that would have good traction in the wet weather but I still wanted a nice looking shoe. I am so pleased with them. I cannot wait to wear them on my cruise. I HIGHLY recommend this shoe to anyone. I would maybe order a half size smaller if you are going to wear without socks, but they fit true to size. I wear a 7 1/2 and I ordered a 7 1/2 and they fit perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise J. Cushman

customer_reviews.title: Too short and ill-fitting
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in my normal size and my toe was crunched into the end, so I ordered the next size up and same result. Additionally, when I ordered up, the toe box was the appropriate width, but the rest of the shoe was somewhat wide. They are, however, nice and cushioned given the large rubber dots on the sole which is a nice change from most women's shoes which are thin and very uncomfortable for walking. I don't understand all the great reviews. Who wants an ill-fitting shoe? Or have to deal with the hassle of returns due to guessing which of the sizes is really your size?
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: I wear a 10 normally and a 10. 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10 normally and a 10.5 in athletic shoes. I ordered this in 11 and it is not long enough.
customer_reviews.author: LegalSkeptic

customer_reviews.title: Expensive Looking but runs big
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 9 but I could have gotten an 8.5 because they run big. I can even wear with my big fluffy socks with no problem ( not that I would) the heel is slightly loose but it’s ok on my foot as my foot is a bit wide but not overly wide. If you have a narrow foot I don’t think these would work for you. They look expensive like from a boutique. They do not have an arch. Very easy to walk on even with the bumpy looking bottom. I bought two pair and they are slightly different. See photos.
customer_reviews.author: CJG

customer_reviews.title: Venus Celia is my new favorite brand of shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These are outrageously comfortable and light weight. The leather is so soft and form fitting! I have two pairs of the Venus Celia bow-topped ballet flats which I wear to work at school extremely often. They really stand up beautifully to frequent wear. Those flats look like adorable shoes but give you the grip and comfort of a sneaker. Took a shot on these and they deliver too! All the same benefits of the flats are in this buttery-soft loafer. So adorable for such comfort and quality. I bought 37 and typically wear a US 6 or 6.5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: amazing comfort, buy 1/2 size down, leather stretches for a perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I now have 3 pairs of these and receive a complement every time I wear them. My first pair I bought my normal size 7. I have a very skinny foot and they fit great but after i wore them a few times, they wanted to slip off. Then I purchased two more (size 6), and after the second day wearing them, they fit perfect. If they had 6 1/2 available in the color I wanted, I would have bought it but because it is leather, they conformed to my exact size. Can't wait to purchase more colors
customer_reviews.author: Vance

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad
customer_reviews.text: I took a gamble ordering them because, oh my lord, they are ugly but the reviews are all so favorable. The good: super soft and comfortable, cheap price point The bad: they run big The ugly: they’re ugly Verdict: sadly, I’m returning them. I wanted to like them but I just can’t. Maybe they’d look less frumpy if I went down a half size but I’m not sure I’m interested in investing any more time in buying and returning a pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: So Ugly They're Cute--and COMFY!
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT little shoe. Firs true to size and doesn't need any "breaking in" period. Not much to look at, but for early morning walks...who cares. I saw someone younger and far hipper than I wearing a bright yellow pair once, and they looked really great on her six-foot frame with white skinny jeans. For a middle-aged frump, though, I wouldn't recommend for fashion--just for really, really comfortable walking.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy47

customer_reviews.title: no support
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was comfortable that is why I chose it. The soft leather was wonderful for my delicate feel but unfortunately it was too soft to support my foot. I had a serious broken foot where I spent 6 months in a wheel chair as I was non weight bearing so I need a shoe that is soft but at the same time sturdy. The soft is a 5 but the shoe didn't support my foot so I gave them away. the price was excellent and if you do not have any foot issues the shoe should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: susan antonucci

customer_reviews.title: Too small, but geogous shoes
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes. Omg...but it's too small. And to think i ordered another pair. I ordered size 11 medium...I ordered a similar brand (Adibosy) which fits perfectly, but this brand did not. So dissapointed, they are sooo cute. Adibosy doesn't have this color. Note to maker: 1/2 an inch more and shoes will be perfect. I tried walking in them, and could not. They are just that tight. Leigh
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes and the price.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit true to size, and are incredibly comfortable. I've started substitute teaching, and these are the most comfortable option I've got in closet for standing/walking all day. I'm getting more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and light on my feet
customer_reviews.text: The color I picked was blue/navy (true in color) in 7.5 B (M) US size (true on the size). So comfortable and light on my feet. It will be one of my everyday footwear and the price was good. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: MQ

customer_reviews.title: Light as a feather.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I am extremely cautious when it comes to my shoes. I have to have proper heel/arch support due to plantar fasciitis. I gave these a try after reading reviews. They are soo light! Really really comfortable! Getting more. Only thing is thinking I have to gone down a 1/2 to a whole size. My actual size feels loose. Like after wearing for a while they will get kinda floppy. Light as a feather though. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZingZON

customer_reviews.title: Such a comfy loafer!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in orange, and the other loafer style in blue. Orange size 10 fit fine. I ordered blue in 10 and 10.5. The orange 10 was marked 43 (European sizing) and the blue 10.5 was 43 as well. Basically if it comes in half sizes in this brand, order a size up. I normally wear a 41 but in this brand I need the 43 I sent the blue ones back, the color wasn't appealing in person. I bought these because my job entails a lot of indoor walking and my feet were aching. These feel amazing!!! Almost like I'm wearing sneakers. I ordered them in black as well. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amber Waves

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes right before I left for a trip to Nicaragua. I was nervous because shoes take forever to break in and I have a hard time to find a comfortable shoes. Well these shoes are amazing! I spend three week walking all around Ometepe an island in Nicaragua. I walked on the beach, dirt roads, paths up a volcano and they were fantastic. Now I’ve had them 4 months and I’m back in Vermont . They still look beautiful with a dress or pants while I’m working in the garden. I get tons of compliments on them too... I bought the black but I’m planning on getting more color. You will love them.
customer_reviews.author: cblakely

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and true to size.
customer_reviews.text: I'm bummed they don't make a 9.5. I ordered up to a ten and they're a little loose. I'm afraid if they stretch at all they'll be too big. I will say that these things are crazy comfortable. I was surprised when I tried them on.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Eads

customer_reviews.title: You’ll want more than 1 pair
customer_reviews.text: I bought the yellow with tan patches. Super comfortable and stylish as well. I received 5 compliments in one day while wearing these shoes. Liked them so much, I bought two more pair in other colors! Update: brought these to NY for a weekend and walked an avg. of 8 miles per day. No blisters, no hurting feet at the end of the day; one day, it poured rain and my feet stayed dry and warm as we toured Liberty and Ellis Island. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I looooooove these shoes. A surgeon I work with wears them in the OR, and I was shocked when she told me they were from Amazon! They are super comfortable and cute - I get compliments on them all the time. The yellow mustard color is perfect and goes with almost anything. I did have to order two pair in order to get one pair that was perfect - the right shoe of first pair I bought had a kind of crumpled toe that rubbed on my foot in an uncomfortable way. I bought a second pair, kept that right shoe, and sent the other two shoes back together :)
customer_reviews.author: JennLo

customer_reviews.title: Makes Me a Proud Lady in Red!
customer_reviews.text: These soft moccasins make me dazzle any room, no matter what outfit I wear with them! I often slip them on with my casual pants and tops, just to bring pizzazz to my otherwise, plain attire. And they work when I wear business-casual skirts and blouses. They are not perfectly stitched. So they look like I might have sewn them, myself! I actually can't even sew buttons back on, whenever buttons pop off from my garments and shoes (smile). But I can look like a lady who has the sewing skills needed to made these unique, comfortable, red shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Skeptical Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but too wide
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but too wide. And that's saying a lot since I have wide feet. I removed their insert to put in my own but my feet do slide sideways because the material gives just a bit too much. But for the price it's a good buy. Those with narrow feet, beware.
customer_reviews.author: White Apple

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and light weight
customer_reviews.text: These had good reviews, and so for $20 and lots of color choices..why not. They fit as expected. My size 8 was a touch tight in length - but these are leather and will stretch a bit. They were comfortable the first time wearing them. I walked two miles in them - straight from the box. These are in no-way support shoes- They have almost none. But, if you are looking for comfortable shoes to knock around a bit, run to the store - or short walks. these are the shoes you need to look for.
customer_reviews.author: rsakols

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what all the fuss is about
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why this is so highly rated. No arch support. Wore it a couple of times and not very comfortable also got pretty stretched out. Now it is too big. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Surprising!
customer_reviews.text: Wow surprisingly cute and comfortable! I think it’s super comfy because it’s a bit loose and allows plenty of room for your feet and I have wide feet. Got the red and it’s super cute. I was a bit hesitant as I thought they would look like house slippers but they look cute with jeans, pants... whatever. Update: I’ve sent the link to these shoes to several people by request. Everyone loves them.
customer_reviews.author: SBanana

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable! Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: I first saw these shoes advertised on Facebook somewhere for a lot more money. As always when something interests me, I immediately go to Amazon to see if Amazon has the same item offered, and to read the reviews of people who have actually bought them. The reviews were good on Amazon and so I ordered a pair in white. I loved them so much that I’ve since ordered them in navy and in tan. We have a large home with brick floors throughout and, although beautiful, they do make my feet hurt. These days, though, my new shoes make life a whole lot more comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: My feet were so happy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to wear on the weekends something casual but comfy. As soon as they arrived I tried them on so comfortable it was a pleasure to wear them. I didn't take them off all evening. I worn them to work when I stand for 7-8 hrs, I take a 20 min break for a quick lunch and sometimes even standing. My feet did not swell or hurt by the end of the day. I'm ordering another pair in a different color. My mother tried them on and now she wants a pair. Highly recommend them they look cute too.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Almost don’t want to tell how much I love these to keep them my own little secret value!
customer_reviews.text: These are SOOOO comfortable. I am a nurse in an administration role. I need to dress in business casual clothing, but I still need shoes that are comfortable when on my feet most of the day. These are perfect! They go with work clothes, but there are so many color choices, you could easily pair them with some jeans, or crop pants for a chic and casual look as well. And they are so comfortable! Seriously! I receive compliments on my shoes all the time and so many people ask me where to get them. And you cannot beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Brown

customer_reviews.title: Tie box is way too short!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is cute but the toe box is way too short! Your feet slide forward making it more uncomfortable! I bought these thinking they would be great to teach in. They hurt your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Dwain & Patricia Landry

customer_reviews.title: Fits a wide foot, perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased size 10 in white ( I also normally wear a 10 in shoes). My feet are flat and wide so they fit perfectly for me. If you have small and/or narrow feet these would definitely be too big, so I see why there were negative reviews. They are super comfortable and I would reccomend them to anyone who wants some comfortable shoes for everyday walking. The shoes are just as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: CRJS2013

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I dislike about these shoes. I ordered three pair (Navy, Black and Red) after seeing a friend wear them. I get so many compliments on them.. I ordered my normal size and they fit perfectly. This is the most comfortable shoe I've run across in a long time, right from the beginning. I've had quite a lot of surgery on my feet so I have trouble finding comfort in shoes, but these fit the bill. I will probably pick up a couple more pair soon in different colors because you sure can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Bertelsen

customer_reviews.title: Size up a size when buying these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a black flat to wear with dressy pants on vacation. Wanted something lightweight and easily packable in a suitcase. These shoes meet those criteria Unfortunately they are a bit short. My great toe comes to the very end of the shoe, and the top of the shoe presses down on the toenail. Because of the price, I plan to keep them. I am hoping to be able to wear them long enough to go out to dinner. I am also hoping that they will stretch a little as I wear them. I would consider them somewhat wider than a medium width.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size received but still comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 8 which should be a 38-39 according to the size chart. I was shipped a 40 which is a 9.5 according to the size chart. I did not pay attention to the sizing when they arrived as I was in need of that color shoe. The show is very comfortable and I am buying another pair in a different color. Hoping the send the right size 8 this time and will update the review based on what I receive and the fir of the second pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and buttery but order a half size up at least
customer_reviews.text: They’re cute! A little crooked looking but cute! I ordered these on sale for 6 dollars so can’t complain but they do seem to run a little small in length - probably better to order a half or full size up. I went with my most used shoe size an 11 and my toes are pushing at the front, I have to drag my feet back in the shoes while walking to keep them from hurting but maaaaaybe after wearing them long enough they’ll magically fit better 😂 is still recommend them for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Eads

customer_reviews.title: These are really nice, comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: This shoe fits my feet perfectly! Not too tight in the toe area. Actually very comfortable in the toe area, where traditionally, it’s hard for me to find shoes that aren’t too tight (due to wide feet and other problems with my feet). So, yeah, I like them! Would recommend them to purchase. I bought another shoe by this maker, and because they have a tie on the side, they don’t fit my feet well at all. Too tight in the toe area. So, I will be returning those.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Im buying more!!
customer_reviews.text: I almost bought a pair from another seller that looked identical to these for double the price! I did read the reviews on this pair and the others. Ive been a size 9-10, with reviews stating this rype if shoe stretch, I ordered a 9. Fit great. and VERY COMFY! As you can see in picture my left foot and ankle are swollen ( my usual after breaking my leg) so at times Im very leary about ordering shoes without trying them on. Im ordering another pair tonight!!!
customer_reviews.author: LisalouRN

customer_reviews.title: style is cute
customer_reviews.text: I like the style, but the material it's made from looks "cheap" and the little gold clip makes it look "cheap", but the size was almost right, it was a bit snug in length, but a little too wide. If it was made without the gold plated metal clip it would be nicer, maybe just a leather lace or even nothing.. the accent does not add to the design. They are comfortable and do stretch a little so they were not uncomfortable even after walking a long distance.
customer_reviews.author: shannon taylor

customer_reviews.title: They stretch
customer_reviews.text: Ok, 4 stars because they do stretch, when i first got these, they were snug but they quickly loosened. I wish they had not stretched as much as they did. They are comfy, I have to walk my daughter to the bus stop super early and these are great to slip my feet into quickly. Love them with jeans, I hoped to wear them with dress slacks but I don't think they will work. I also wear them when i run errands on the weekend because they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: S. Christian

customer_reviews.title: cute quirky little shoe
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a strong 61/2. I have a narrow foot and my feet are flat. I ordered a six and they initially seemed too wide because the leather is loose and falls towards my foot. I know that sounds odd but that is what makes this shoe unique. I think these would be perfect for women who have trouble with edema. I wear these with socks and even without socks, they don't appear too big and don't flop around in spite of some gaping on the sides. I think they are super cute and very comfortable. I like different bold shoes and these are perfect for me. I received them two days after ordering! I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Lori gorichanaz

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfortable, but runs slightly small. No arch support.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a consistent 8 in shoes and this runs slighly small, but they don’t sell them in 1/2 sizes. It’s comfortable however, and provides plenty of room in toe bed. Con: The sole is glued in, so I couldn’t remove to add my own arch support, and because the shoe already ran a bit small, my arch supports wouldn’t fit in the shoe. I suspect that had I bought a 9, added my own arch supports on top of the existing sole, that the shoe would fit much better. I consider them a cute “knock-around” shoe. Cute for the money.
customer_reviews.author: gpmom2

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable but not well made
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were perfect in so many ways. It felt a bit loose but it fit well and was very comfortable. The materials seem strong but it was poorly put together . Within a month the sole started to come loose/ glue wore off. I continued using it for a while but after a while (less than 2 months) the sole is so loose that I cannot wear it anymore. All other parts of the shoes seem strong. It is too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: crixcross

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe, but not meant for walking long distances.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good shoe if you have to stand on hard surfaces, it has a forgiving sole, the leather stretches to fit your foot nicely and they are quite attractive. I have a navy and a burgundy pair. But don't go shopping in them or take a hike please. Not much of an arch support. But they are comfortable for hanging around in and as I say, if you have to work standing on a hard surface. I have a narrow foot and wear a size 7. I ordered the 7 and they fit well. AND they stretch a little. I will probably buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love them already! These shoes are cute and comfortable. They're a little snug across the bridge but I can tell that the material will loosen/stretch just to my liken. I naturally have a wide foot, however, for the past two years they swell off and on_That makes it hard to find an affordable, comfortable, stylish shoe that fits. Plenty of colors to choose from too. *Please excuse my stocking. The last photo is after trying them on and walking around for ten minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Gigi

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the most comfortable shoes that I have EVER purchased!. I did not expect much because they are so inexpensive, but I was completed surprised. They are much more comfortable than any comparable shoe found at Nordstrom's or other high end stores. I am on my feet most of my 8 hour shift and these shoes are wonderful on my feet. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: BEV

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable shoes! I was a little concerned they wouldn't fit right buying them without trying them on but they fit perfectly. I bought a size 10 and they felt true to size. For reference, I wear a women's size 10 normal width in Skechers. I didn't have any fit issues with these. You will need to wear thinner socks with these. I really like the shoes and may get additional colors. I can wear them all day at my office and my feet feel just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Go With Naney

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2 more
customer_reviews.text: You cannot beat these for the money. I got my regular size and they fit like a dream. Soft, good support, love the memory foam on the insole. I got this red - it was more orange than lipstick - and I just ordered the navy. Also ordered a pair for my 94 year old mom. Can't wait to see how she likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Forster

customer_reviews.title: Do not believe all the positive reviews
customer_reviews.text: These are as cheap as you would expect. Absolutely no support of any kind. You might as well be walking on concrete. They have the rubber bottoms and that's it. No interior padding or anything. How is that supposed to be good for walking anywhere for any time frame. I am sure most of the reviews are fake and made by friends of whoever is selling them to pull people in to buying them. They are cute but cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Love These Shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these super cute pink shoes yesterday. Wore them all day and my feet loved them. Right out of the box they fit like a dream. I bought an 8 as usual and it fit like a glove. I'm crazy about these shoes and if I'm not careful, I'm going to buy all the colors. I'm seriously considering the burgundy now. They look super cool with ankle length and cropped jeans. The leather is soft and seems to stretch nicely with each wearing. Yes, I think I need ALL of the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kymberlyn A Reed (The Fountain Pen Diva)

customer_reviews.title: Got what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 6 and ordered the same size, shoe fit perfectly with a little wiggle room for my toes. They feel good to walk in and look nice. Update 01/26/19: wore these shoes all day, there is no arch support but that can be fixed by changing out the insoles. Insoles are easy to remove, but I'm not sliding around in my shoes. Shoes feel nice and dont need to be broken in. The tread is nice to walk on as well and feel good against my feet. Update 05/03/2020: one of my go to shoes for office wear and dress casual settings. They still look and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: miranda

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are made of real leather, and they are great value. However, after only a short time the stitches at the toes break apart. I owe several colors, and noticed that this seem to be a problem with all the metallic shades, like gold and silver for some reason. Maybe going one size up would leave enough room at the toes for the stitches not to fall apparat? Otherwise cute and comfortable flats for work.
customer_reviews.author: Wlodka70

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Cushioney
customer_reviews.text: I love these loafers. My right foot is a bit longer than my left one so the right shoe feels a bit tight. The shoe material is quite pliable so I believe, as indicated by the manufacturer, that the shoe will stretch after a few wears. Also, the shoe has an insole which could be removed if need be. I would definitely buy the loafers again. Great quality for the price. I normally wear a 4.5-5 size. I ordered these in a 5.
customer_reviews.author: JEC

customer_reviews.title: No.
customer_reviews.text: Such a disappointment. These room super small - I had to go a size up and they still were a little short. There is no arch support, so they are pretty useless. (And my husband said I looked like Aladdin in these...)
customer_reviews.author: Laura Estes

customer_reviews.title: These may be the most comfortable pair of shoes I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: These may be the most comfortable pair of shoes I have ever owned! I'm a nurse practitioner in a very busy office and am on my feet walking for many hours each day. When I wear these at work, it doesnt feel like I've been on my feet all day! They do not rub, and the shoes are not right at all! Very soft leatherish material that doesnt squeeze my toes. I usually wear a size 10.5 and ordered an 11. I think I'm going to get a pair in every color! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Christi Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! I’ve just spent the last 6 weeks walking around several major European cities with my preschooler on my back and not a single issue. No blisters, sore feet at the end of the day, or any noticable wear and tear. And I’m a plus-sized woman so I was not expecting them to last! Fantastic shoes and I’m ordering another pair as soon as I get home! They do run a bit big, I usually wear a 9.5 and had to choose between 9 and 10. I went with the 9 and they were perfection! So soft and comfy whilst still looking very stylish, both with dresses and pants!
customer_reviews.author: nimskie

customer_reviews.title: looks like a fancy Italian shoe but too tight
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 11 and the 11 was just a tad snug on my big toe... I was planning to use them for work which is standing and walking all day but I know from past experience with shoes that push on my toe I would regret wearing them immediately...However for $20...I may keep them and see if maybe I can stretch them with a shoe stretcher and just use them for "fun"...FYI my feet are very narrow and the width is not an issue... I like the nubby sole too. I wish they had an 11.5 cause that would fit perfectly I think :)
customer_reviews.author: andrea stuart

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase more...comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I purchased these. They fit a bit tight as my feet sometimes are swollen after standing for very long periods of time. Withing five minutes they was so comfortable I wanted to buy another pair. I told all my co-worker to get a pair. Most comfortable shoes I've worn in a very long time. I wore them to work and had no problems with them. Would not recommend them for long periods of time (For me it was 10 hrs) but that would be any pair of shoes in my opinion. Will definitely purchase more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Imahlah

customer_reviews.title: Stitching comes undone
customer_reviews.text: On the 5th time these were worn, the stitching came undone on one of the heals. The thread that was used to stitch up the back of the heal did not break, it just came undone. It does not appear that there were any knots at the ends of the threads and it was expected that simple friction was supposed to keep them from coming out. The shoes look nice, but due to the poor workmanship in the stitching could not recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these loafers! I was looking for a comfortable pair of walking shoes that weren't athletic type shoes and these are perfect. I struggle to find shoes that are comfortable for me. I spent a weekend walking around Austin, TX in these and never once were my feet tired or sore. That is unheard of for me! The quality is good for the price as well. I typically wear a 7, sometimes a 7.5, and ordered these in a 7.5 after reading other reviews. They fit well and are not tight on my feet. I will definitely order other colors!
customer_reviews.author: Jill G

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and nice feeling material
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are really cute - look just as the picture does. My only issue is they seem a bit small. Right now I've got one foot in bandages and it's my longer foot. As soon as I can try the shoes on that foot, I'll know if I have to exchange for a bigger size. Don't know if they have an 8 1/2 tho.... I've got a trip planned at Christmas time that will have me doing lots of walking and these will be great for that. If these fit (or even if I have to exchange) I'm thinking I'll want more in other colors :)
customer_reviews.author: Terry Greene

customer_reviews.title: Size down a half size
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 39 in European which is an 8-8.5. I ordered an 8, and it was too big. I noticed on the shoe box it said an 8 was a 40, so I reordered a 7.5 which in fact was the 39. My opinion size down a half size. Not very stylish but extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sue C.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe based on the reviews. I am starting a new retail job in a week where I'll be expected to be on my feet in a 180,000 square foot facility. This had me worried so I started looking for a comfortable shoe that I could wear with dress slacks. This shoe does seem comfortable so I'm anxious to see how it does on the showroom floor. I'll update my review once I can speak to that.
customer_reviews.author: Soup1958

customer_reviews.title: comfy & practical
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are workhorses! I have the red and the black. They go with everything—dress up or down, pants or skirt. There’s some cushion in the sole, which is nice. I could do without the gold clamp on the side, but it’s small and discreet.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe for work
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! I ordered the tan a few months back and loved them so much I ordered the black. They’re super comfortable and very in style right now. I get so many compliments. I work in a business casual industry and these are my go to work shoes. If you like loafers, definitely buy these! I have wide feet and these fit perfect. If you’re at half sizes, order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Fischler

customer_reviews.title: Too small for me
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I already have a pair in black that looks almost identical in a size 11, but I had ordered them from Empress, an Australian company. I also paid around $69, but they fit. My usual shoe size is 10 to 10.5. As soon as I put the VenusCelia shoe on in size 11, I could feel they were too short. So had to return. Too bad because they have a lot of nice colors and the quality seemed about the same.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the most comfortable shoe I own. I bought on a whim, nervous about the look and quality. Chose the orange color thinking if they looked ugly, maybe I could get away with it since the color is kinda ugly. I get stopped everywhere I go asking where I bought these. They are definitely casual, so pulling them off in the office on any day other then Friday might get you a look or two - but otherwise, do not hesitate to buy yourself a pair. I will definitely be buying other colors.
customer_reviews.author: william e. watkinson

customer_reviews.title: so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and they feel like you are wearing slippers. To be honest, they are thin material and that is probably why they feel so soft, but I've worn mine out quite a few times and they still look great. They go with just about anything and what I like best is that people see them and ask where you got them because they HAVENT seen them in the same old stores we all shop at.
customer_reviews.author: Shlyre

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I always read the reviews of the products I buy online and I agree with the previous reviews of these shoes. They are very comfortable right out of the box, no break in period needed. The construction feels quite solid and the materials used are of good quality. Well worth the price. I may buy more colors after I have had these for a little while to see how they wear.
customer_reviews.author: peajay star

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly very comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I had so many compliments on these shoes. For the price, they are amazing. I work at a hospital and I’m on my feet quite a bit, and these have been fantastic. Very comfortable. The only pic I have a suggestivehI had so many compliments on these shoes. For the price, they are amazing. I work at a hospital and I’m on my feet quite a bit, and these have been fantastic. Very comfortable. The only thing I would suggest is getting arch supports and gluing down the “insole” they have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but....
customer_reviews.text: Just not for me. A little too clunky and large on my feet. Fit larger than I wanted in the toe area, a bit loose on my foot, maybe good for wider widths? Quality seemed okay, bottom was nice and the stitching looked good. Not lined, just one single fabric (leather?) with no lining so a bit thin. Length seemed true to size but they just weren't for me.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon L Grauer

customer_reviews.title: Best online shoe purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I actually thought they would be too small coming out of the box. I ordered an 8 and am usually an 8-8.5. They're slightly and I mean slightly too big. They didn't flop or come off at the heel though. They are AMAZINGLY comfortable though! And cute! I wore these for a day at Disneyland and my feet faired better than when I wore my sketchers with memory foam the day before! And NO BLISTERS! No breaking in! Ready to go out of the box! I want more!
customer_reviews.author: A. Priest

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, very comfy.
customer_reviews.text: I wear these shoes everyday for work. I do a lot of walking and they still look brand new even though they're four months old. They feel like slippers, for real, like walking on clouds. Will definitely be buying these again when it's time for new work shoes. The style is a little old lady-ish but my feet are so happy I don't even care.
customer_reviews.author: PupperMom

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice shoe for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I just got these shoes, in both navy and white, and really like them. They’re a bargain for the price. I got these for an upcoming vacation that’s going to include a lot of walking - these will be perfect and won’t take up much space at all in my luggage. I usually wear a size 6 1/2 and bought a 7 - the fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: linda crawford kober

customer_reviews.title: I love these!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I wear them to work almost everyday. That's a lot of walking, including walking to and from the bus. They're not sneakers of course, but for cute work shoes these are amazing! The insert for the sole of the shoe is starting to flake off, but Dr Scholls insert would easily fit back into the shoe and make it even better! I'll be buying more colors, for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Professional look. Comfy.
customer_reviews.text: At 20-ish USD $ these are great. I work as a Realtor and these are great for tour days during the summer since they are light and cool but are also closed toe. Easy on and off. My feet don’t sweat in these. They aren’t amazing quality and will likely last only several months, which will suit my needs well. Also great as house/garden shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Powell

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I was blown away. I read the reviews and was a little skeptical. I ordered a pair and have been wearing for past 7 weeks most everyday for 8/12 hours a day. At the end of the day, my back doesn't hurt and the shoes still look like I took them out of the box! Very durable and comfortable. I was even surprised when I wear without socks they don't make my feet sweat so no unpleasant smell!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Poor cow had to give up its hide for this?
customer_reviews.text: This is just a crappy cheap shoe made with leather. The rubber soap is glue on and comically outlines even the little sewn ridge on the front of the shoe. It’s just a goofy flat footed waste of leather. I sent it back immediately.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made.
customer_reviews.text: Although the shoe is a bit too tight for my big foot, the construction is wonderful. The bottom sole is exactly what I would expect from a high priced shoe. Perfect bottom that will walk like a pillow and not let you slip.
customer_reviews.author: Inny

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is soft and no doubt very comfortable as the product stated
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is soft and no doubt very comfortable as stated. However, the size 8M I purchased is a little too big. I should have purchased a 7.5M and that would have been the perfect size for me. I think that for these types of shoes the size chart should be accurate and NOT as the reference chart provides. 8M on the chart specify 38-39 - but I got a 41 - So if 8M for Venus Celia is 41, it should indicate that, and I would NOT HAVE BOUGHT 8M, I would have bought a 7.5M. So I'm a bit disappointed, as the shoes is a little too big for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gweneth Vllafana

customer_reviews.title: Very light and confortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I order, this time I ordered 1/2 size up in order to fit a arch support sole, because it doesn’t have an arch support. That turned them in my fave walking shoes, I even took them to Europe as my walking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: vegderdz

customer_reviews.title: Women’s shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes can quickly, they were kind of squished together in the package but we’re undamaged. They are quite comfortable, they fit well and they are usually clean. The soul has a massage in bumps I guess you’d call them. They make the shoe quite comfortable when walking. I definitely would buy these shoes again.
customer_reviews.author: redkatgirl

customer_reviews.title: True to size and witdth
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe because I have a very wide foot and my Podiatrist recommended that I wear shoes that will not squish my feet. That is exactly what these shoes do. They are very comfortable for my toe box but the strong support around my foot is not there. The sizing is correct. I wear a 6, and it fits perfect. I got 2 pair. One lite gray and one hot pink. The pink ones stain my socks pink, so beware of that. It is the raw dyed leather inside. I like the option and ranges of colors and have ultimately been happy with my purchase. The price for product and the width have made me very content.
customer_reviews.author: Erika J.

customer_reviews.title: Has comfort factor but looks a bit unfinished
customer_reviews.text: When I got my pair, these shoes looked different than expected. I bought these shoes in tan and thought they looked a bit unfinished in appearance. But they have the comfort factor and are a great fit. I did not need to break these shoes in either, which is a bonus. I will definitely consider buying another pair in a different color in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I have 2 pair and get compliments every day I wear them. They are so comfortable I originally started wearing them as house shoes but they quickly became my everyday easy slip ons. I had a minor unraveling of 1 stitch after only a month. If I can’t mend it I’ll ask for a refund and report back on customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Wassenaar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe! The material is lightweight and the rubber sole is awesome and supportive. I hurt my foot from another pair of shoes and wore these. I'll be ordering more and looking for shoes with this particular rubber bottom. I'm flat foot and my days go from 7 AM till 8 PM. No problem wearing these. I wore these 2 days in a row and my foot pain is gone.
customer_reviews.author: E. D. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Starbucks Employee on my feet for hours
customer_reviews.text: I've spent hundreds of dollars trying to find the right shoe for my high arch and pained feet. These shoes are such soft leather that they do not pinch in any area at all. The bounce to them because of the rubber sole keeps them comfortable all day. They are also truly non-slip. They do stretch but since they do not have half sizes, just buy true to your size otherwise one whole size smaller may not be right for you.
customer_reviews.author: CroFly

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoe
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes because they looked like they would be comfortable. They are comfortable and not many shoes are for me. The rubber soles help keep ones legs from getting tired. The only reason I didn’t give them 5 stars is the leather is very thin and since I over pronate I don’t think they will hold up for long
customer_reviews.author: Mary M LeGore

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are great
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great. I should have ordered a half size larger because my feet/ankles tend to swell. I wore them shopping and noticed after several hours my feet did become tired. So, wear them for short errands or as travelling shoes because of the ease of getting them on and off. They really are a cute little shoe just don't wear them to hike or all day at an amusement park.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes - feels like you have slippers on.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes they feel like slippers on your feet. They exceeded my expectations for the price. Comfortable for walking from first time I put them on. No areas rubbing etc, great value fir money and I plan to order more in a different color. I was worried about the soul looking at pictures but not an issue at all. Comfy as can be.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J Stout

customer_reviews.title: Perfect comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I don't regularly review items, however these shoes are worth (to me) raving about !! I usually wear size 9, but when they came (in black ) they were a little short in toe area, just slightly. Returned for the burgundy / wine color in size 9 1/2. They now fit my feet like they were tailored just for me! Thankfully they are not narrow, as sometimes the medium width can be too snug because of my bunions. I'm considering buying a different color😊 Price just can't be beat!
customer_reviews.author: LeAnne Nash

customer_reviews.title: MOST COMFORTABLE shoes I own!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes for my office job that requires I dress in office attire, meaning I cannot wear tennis shoes because if I could, that is the kind of girl I am and I would definitely choose comfort before style. However, this pair of shoes is perfect for every day wear to the office without looking too casual. Every day, I find myself trying to find outfits to match these shoes so I don't have to wear uncomfortable shoes. I would definitely recommend these shoes as a solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Creech

customer_reviews.title: Better than what I expected...
customer_reviews.text: Thought they were going to look cheap and look like clown shoes. These are a size 10 which is my normal shoe size and they don’t appear to look long at all. They are very nice and roomy...comfortable enough for me to wear to work. I ended up buying the gray pair as well because I liked them so much...I’m just patiently waiting on them to come!
customer_reviews.author: KRISSY

customer_reviews.title: Look and feel great, but be prepared to buy inserts
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are SUPER cute. I bought a half size larger because I was pretty sure I'd need to add inserts. I stand all day and can't afford to have sore feet. These little gems are exactly as I expected, including the fact that they would need inserts. Good quality shoe for a low price.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELE

product_meta.title: VenusCelia Women's Natural Comfort Walking Flat Loafer
product_meta.description: VenusCelia Women's Natural Comfort Walking Flat Loafers are soft and comfy and breathable, firmly with great flexibility. The Simple design with sleek lines, perfect fit you foot, always keep you on comfortable for any activities such as driving or go to work ect. These moccasin style cute shoes can be worn as both casual loafers and slippers. Wear-resisting rubber sole with function of skid resistance, making you lighter when walking.
feature_bullets: Lightweight slip on shoes with metal bit ornament
Moccasins style loafers with ingenious design: as flats; as slippers
Soft leather upper for keeping snug, durable outsole with massage function bottom
Padded insole makes you feel comfortable when walking or standing all day
Suitable for occasion: casual, driving, everyday, going out, indoor, office, shopping, travelling, working, etc.
